first_para: Nicholas Desmond John Smith (born January 1960), known as Nick Smith, is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blaenau Gwent since the May 2010 election. From 1998 to 2005 he was a councillor in the London Borough of Camden.

full.extract: Nicholas Desmond John Smith (born January 1960), known as Nick Smith, is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blaenau Gwent since the May 2010 election. From 1998 to 2005 he was a councillor in the London Borough of Camden.
full.title: Nick Smith (British politician)
